title: SOLD  T206 Thomas - American Beauty PSA-5  *Highest Graded*
author: T3s

posts.post_title: SOLD  T206 Thomas - American Beauty PSA-5  *Highest Graded*
posts.post_content:
Hi,

T206 Ira Thomas - PSA-5  American Beauty - of five graded, this is by far the highest graded example (others are A, 1, 2, 2.5).

Prices on these have really gone up.  Last night in Goodwin, a PSA-4 Downs went for $1,952 and an SGC 60 Leifield went for $691.  A few days ago on Ebay, a Dygert in PSA-4 went for $953.

$SOLD.  Thanks!

Thanks much,
Craig
